00014 #if ! defined(_Adc_IndexTable_hpp)
00015 #define _Adc_IndexTable_hpp
00016 
00017 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00018 
00022 template<class T> class IndexTable
00023 {
00024     public:
00026         IndexTable() : m_indextable(0), m_count(0), m_size(0) {}
00028         IndexTable(INT count) : m_count(count), m_size(count)  { 
00029             m_indextable = new T[count]; 
00030             if(m_indextable==0) {
00031                 m_count = 0;
00032                 m_size = 0;
00033             }
00034         }
00035         
00036         IndexTable(const IndexTable<T>& indextable) 
00037                : m_indextable(0), m_count(indextable.m_count), m_size(indextable.m_count)  {
00038             if (indextable.m_indextable != 0) {
00039                 m_indextable = new T[m_count]; 
00040                 if(m_indextable==0) {
00041                     m_count = 0;
00042                     m_size = 0;
00043                 } else {
00044                     for (INT i = 0; i < m_size; ++i) {
00045                         m_indextable[i] = indextable.m_indextable[i];
00046                     }
00047                 }
00048             }
00049         }
00050 
00052         ~IndexTable() { 
00053             if (m_indextable != 0) {
00054                 delete[] m_indextable; 
00055                 m_indextable = 0;
00056             }
00057         }
00058 
00060         BOOLEAN Resize(INT count) {
00061             if(m_size<count) {
00062                 delete[] m_indextable;
00063                 m_indextable = new T[count];
00064                 if(m_indextable==0) {
00065                     m_size = 0;
00066                     m_count = 0;
00067                     return FALSE;
00068                 }
00069                 m_size = count;
00070             }
00071             m_count = count;    
00072             return TRUE;
00073         }
00074 
00076         inline void SetValue(INT idx, T value) { m_indextable[idx] = value; }
00078         inline T  GetValue(INT idx) const { return m_indextable[idx]; }
00079 
00081         const T operator [] (INT idx) const { return m_indextable[idx]; }
00083         T operator [] (INT idx) { return m_indextable[idx]; }
00085         IndexTable<T>& operator = (const IndexTable<T>& indextable) { 
00086             if (this == &indextable) {
00087                 return *this;
00088             }
00089             INT size = indextable.GetSize();
00090             Resize(size);
00091             for (INT i = 0; i < size; ++i) {
00092                 m_indextable[i] = indextable.m_indextable[i];
00093             }
00094             return *this; 
00095         }
00096 
00098         inline void SwapValues(INT row1, INT row2) {
00099             T help = GetValue(row1);
00100             SetValue(row1,GetValue(row2));
00101             SetValue(row2,help);
00102         }
00103 
00105         inline void MoveValue(INT row1, INT row2) {
00106             INT row = row1;
00107             while (row != row2)
00108             {
00109                SwapValues(row, row +1);
00110                row++;
00111             }
00112         }
00114         inline void FillIndexValues() {
00115             for(INT i=0; i<m_count; i++)
00116                 SetValue(i,(T)i);
00117         }
00119         inline void FillZeroes() {
00120             for(INT i=0; i<m_count; i++)
00121                 SetValue(i,(T)0);
00122         }
00124         inline INT  GetCount() const { return m_count; }
00125 
00127         inline INT  GetSize() const { return m_size; }
00128 
00129     private:
00130         T *  m_indextable;
00131         INT  m_count;
00132         INT  m_size;
00133 };
00134

00136 
00137 #endif
